languages.text:
Экспериментальный блок: влияние Дитя на психоэмоциональное состояние различных представителей Империума
Уровень доступа: Орселлио-Т-прайм{br}
Опыт №Н4545-1
Подгруппа: чернь, мужской пол
Испытуемые проявляют признаки острого стресса. Основная масса погибла от кровопотери в течение суток после помещения в лабораторный покой вследствие невозможности прекратить выделение глазных секреций — слез — и последующую замену организмом этих секреций на соединительную ткань внутренней среды организма. Особи с наибольшим сопротивлением резонансу священного Дитя погибли на несколько хроно-оборотов позже: обширные раны в брюшной полости, для вспарывания предположительно был использован обломок металла; смерть наступила вследствие удушения собственным кишечником. В предсмертных воплях испытуемые упоминали чудовищные щупальца и пустотных червей, за которые они приняли свои внутренности в результате галлюцинаций.{br}
Опыт №Н4545-2
Подгруппа: чернь, женский пол
Испытуемые умерли в течение часа после попадания в лабораторию, смежную с покоями Дитя. У большинства откушен язык и вырвана либо сильно вывернута нижняя челюсть: некоторым подопытным не хватило физической силы, чтобы отделить ее от остальной части черепа. Причина смерти: тяжелые травмы головы, полученные в результате ударов об пол либо стены.{br}
Опыт №Н4545-3
Подгруппа: парализованный больной, утрачена способность к внятной речи из-за испытанного во время аварии на мануфакторуме шока, мужской пол
Испытуемый отметил покалывание в деградировавших тканях. Во время визита регента Ааронто Орселлио к Дитя испытуемый улыбался, после чего замычал (вероятно, в попытке напеть некий плебейский мотив), а затем заговорил со слугой, принесшим еду. Более продолжительная беседа для испытуемого оказалась невозможна в силу отсутствия у слуги языка.{br}
Опыт №Н4545-4
Подгруппа: бракованные отпрыски благородного П. Орселлио, отлучены от искусства навигации из-за мутаций тканей, которые не позволяют встроить необходимые для слияния с кораблями аугментации, а также общей слабости рассудка, женский пол
Испытуемые зеркально повторяли действия Дитя в течение трех суток. На четвертые сутки Дитя было опечалено известием о гибели офицера личной охраны, Амоса Кантарелли. В результате одна из испытуемых содрала несколько слоев тканей с лица и погибла в результате разрыва сердца.
Последняя выжившая испытуемая казнена за попытку связаться с Дитя.

languages.text:
Experimental section: the Child's influence on the psycho-emotional state of various representatives of the Imperium
Access level: Orsellio-T-prime{br}
Experiment H4545-1
Subgroup: lowborn, male
Test subjects exhibit signs of acute stress. The majority perished of blood loss within a day of being placed in the laboratory chamber due to the inability to halt the discharge of ocular secretions (tears) and the body's subsequent replacement of these secretions with the connective tissue of its internal environment. The individuals with the greatest resistance to the sacred Child's resonance died several chrono-turns later: extensive wounds in the abdomen, presumably inflicted by a jagged piece of metal; death was caused by strangulation with the subjects' own intestines. The subjects' final shouts exhibited concerns over abominable tentacles and void worms, hallucinations prescribed to their own internal organs.{br}
Experiment H4545-2
Subgroup: lowborn, female
The test subjects died within an hour of entering the laboratory adjacent to the Child's chambers. Most had their tongues bitten off or their jaws badly dislocated: some test subjects lacked the physical strength to separate it from the rest of the skull. Cause of death: severe head injuries caused by impacting the walls or the floor.{br}
Experiment H4545-3
Subgroup: a paralysed patient who lost the ability to speak due to the shock caused by a manufactorum accident, male
The test subject noted a tingling sensation in the deteriorated tissue. During Regent Aaronto Orsellio's visit to the Child, the test subject smiled and started humming (most likely trying to carry some plebeian tune) and then attempted to address the servant who brought him food. A lengthy conversation was prohibitive due to the servant's lack of a tongue.{br}
Experiment H4545-4
Subgroup: a defective offspring of Lord P. Orsellio, pronounced unfit for studying the high art of Navigation owing to the mutation of tissues required for installation of the obligatory augmentations that merge one's consciousness with the vessel, additionally they display an overall feebleness of mind, female
The test subjects mirrored the Child's actions for three days. On the fourth day the Child became upset after hearing the news about the untimely demise of Amos Cantarelli, an officer of her personal guard. As a result, one of the test subjects peeled away several layers of tissue from her face and died from the resulting massive heart attack.
The last surviving test subject was executed for attempting to contact the Child.

traits.locale_text:
Experimental section: The Child's influence on the psycho-emotional state of various representatives of the Imperium
Access level: Orsellio-T-prime{br}
Experiment №H4545-1
Subgroup: lowborn, male
Test subjects exhibit the signs of acute stress. The majority perished of blood loss within a day after being placed in the laboratory chamber due to being unable to stop the discharge of ocular secretions (tears) and the body's subsequent replacement of these secretions with the connective tissue of its internal environment. The individuals with the greatest resistance to the sacred Child's resonance died several chrono-rotations later: extensive wounds in the abdomen, presumably inflicted by a jagged piece of metal; death was caused by strangulation by with the subjects' own intestines. The subjects' death cries featured abominable tentacles and void-worms they mistook their internal organs for as the result of hallucinations.{br}
Experiment №H4545-2
Subgroup: lowborn, female
The test subjects died within an hour of entering the laboratory adjacent to the Child's chambers. Most had their tongues bitten off or their jaws badly dislocated: some test subjects lacked the physical strength to separate it from the rest of the skull. Cause of death: severe head injuries caused by impacting the walls or the floor.{br}
Experiment №H4545-3
Subgroup: a paralyzed patient who lost the ability to speak due to the shock caused by a manufactorum accident, male
The test subject noted a tingling sensation in the deteriorated tissue. During a regent Aaronto Orsellio's visit to the Child the test subject smiled and started humming (most likely trying to carry some plebeian tune) and then attempted to address the servant who brought him food. A longer conversation was impossible due to the servant lacking a tongue.{br}
Experiment №H4545-4
Subgroup: a defective offspring of noble P. Orsellio, pronounced unfit for studying the high art of navigation due to the mutation of tissues required to install the augmentations for merging one's consciousness with the vessel and the overall weakness of mind, female
The test subjects mirrored the Child's actions for three days. On the fourth day the Child became upset after hearing the news about the demise of Amos Cantarelli, an officer of her personal guard. As the result, one of the test peeled several layers of tissue off of her face and died as a result of a massive heart attack.
The last surviving test subject was executed for attempting to contact the Child.

Sección experimental: impacto de la niña en el estado psicoemocional de varios representantes del imperio
Nivel de acceso: Orsellio-T-prime{br}
Experimento H4545-1
Subgrupo: plebeyos, hombres
Los sujetos de prueba muestran signos de profundo estrés. La mayoría fallecieron por pérdida de sangre un día después de entrar en la cámara del laboratorio, al ser incapaces de detener la liberación de secreciones oculares (lágrimas) y la subsiguiente sustitución de estas secreciones por tejido conectivo interno. Los individuos que presentaban mayor resistencia a los efectos de la niña fallecieron varios cronogiros después: presentaban grandes heridas en el abdomen, presumiblemente causadas por un trozo de metal puntiagudo. La muerte fue provocada por la estrangulación de los intestinos del sujeto. Los últimos gritos proferidos por los sujetos señalaban preocupación por la existencia de tentáculos abominables y gusanos del vacío, alucinaciones que se atribuyeron a sus órganos internos.{br}
Experimento H4545-2
Subgrupo: plebeyas, mujeres
Los sujetos de prueba fallecieron menos de una hora después de entrar al laboratorio contiguo a los aposentos de la niña. La mayoría se habían mordido la lengua o dislocado gravemente la mandíbula: algunos sujetos de prueba carecían de la fuerza física para separarla del resto del cráneo. Causa de fallecimiento: lesiones graves en la cabeza provocadas por golpes contra las paredes o el suelo.{br}
Experimento H4545-3
Subgrupo: paciente paralizado que perdió la capacidad de hablar tras una conmoción provocada por un accidente en el manufactorum, hombre
El sujeto de prueba comenzó a notar una sensación de hormigueo en el tejido deteriorado. Durante la visita del regente Aaronto Orsellio a la niña, el sujeto de prueba sonreía y murmuraba (probablemente tratando de tararear alguna melodía plebeya) y luego llamó al sirviente que le llevó comida. Debido a la falta de lengua de este último, fue imposible mantener una conversación prolongada.{br}
Experimento H4545-4
Subgrupo: descendientes defectuosas del Lord P. Orsellio, declaradas inaptas para el estudio del elevado arte de la navegación a causa de la mutación de ciertos tejidos, requeridos para la instalación de las mejoras obligatorias para fusionar la propia conciencia con la nave; también mostraban una flaqueza mental generalizada, mujeres
Los sujetos de prueba reprodujeron las acciones de la niña durante tres días. El cuarto día, la niña se disgustó tras enterarse de la inesperada muerte de Amos Cantarelli, un oficial de su guardia personal. Como consecuencia, uno de los sujetos de prueba se arrancó varias capas de piel de la cara y falleció a causa del fuerte ataque al corazón resultante.
El último sujeto de prueba vivo fue ejecutado por intentar hablar con la niña.
languages.original_text:
Experimental section: the Child's influence on the psycho-emotional state of various representatives of the Imperium
Access level: Orsellio-T-prime{br}
Experiment H4545-1
Subgroup: lowborn, male
Test subjects exhibit signs of acute stress. The majority perished of blood loss within a day of being placed in the laboratory chamber due to the inability to halt the discharge of ocular secretions (tears) and the body's subsequent replacement of these secretions with the connective tissue of its internal environment. The individuals with the greatest resistance to the sacred Child's resonance died several chrono-turns later: extensive wounds in the abdomen, presumably inflicted by a jagged piece of metal; death was caused by strangulation with the subjects' own intestines. The subjects' final shouts exhibited concerns over abominable tentacles and void worms, hallucinations prescribed to their own internal organs.{br}
Experiment H4545-2
Subgroup: lowborn, female
The test subjects died within an hour of entering the laboratory adjacent to the Child's chambers. Most had their tongues bitten off or their jaws badly dislocated: some test subjects lacked the physical strength to separate it from the rest of the skull. Cause of death: severe head injuries caused by impacting the walls or the floor.{br}
Experiment H4545-3
Subgroup: a paralysed patient who lost the ability to speak due to the shock caused by a manufactorum accident, male
The test subject noted a tingling sensation in the deteriorated tissue. During Regent Aaronto Orsellio's visit to the Child, the test subject smiled and started humming (most likely trying to carry some plebeian tune) and then attempted to address the servant who brought him food. A lengthy conversation was prohibitive due to the servant's lack of a tongue.{br}
Experiment H4545-4
Subgroup: a defective offspring of Lord P. Orsellio, pronounced unfit for studying the high art of Navigation owing to the mutation of tissues required for installation of the obligatory augmentations that merge one's consciousness with the vessel, additionally they display an overall feebleness of mind, female
The test subjects mirrored the Child's actions for three days. On the fourth day the Child became upset after hearing the news about the untimely demise of Amos Cantarelli, an officer of her personal guard. As a result, one of the test subjects peeled away several layers of tissue from her face and died from the resulting massive heart attack.
The last surviving test subject was executed for attempting to contact the Child.

languages.text:
Experimenteller Abschnitt: Der Einfluss des Kinds auf den psycho-emotionalen Zustand verschiedener Vertreter des Imperiums
Zugangsstufe: Orsellio-T-prime{br}
Experiment H4545-1
Untergruppe: Von niedriger Geburt, männlich
Versuchspersonen zeigen Anzeichen von akutem Stress. Die Mehrheit ist innerhalb eines Tages, nachdem sie in die Laborkammer gebracht worden waren, an Blutverlust gestorben. Grund hierfür waren die Ausscheidung okularer Sekrete (Tränen) sowie die Tatsache, dass der Körper diese Sekrete anschließend durch das Bindegewebe seiner inneren Umgebung ersetzt hat. Die Personen mit der größten Resistenz gegen die Resonanz des heiligen Kinds sind mehrere Chrono-Umdrehungen später gestorben: Schwere Wunden im Abdomen, mutmaßlich durch ein gezacktes Stück Metall verursacht; der Tod wurde durch Strangulation mit den eigenen Gedärmen der Versuchspersonen verursacht. Die letzten Schreie der Versuchspersonen enthielten Sorgen über abscheuliche Tentakel und Leerewürmer, Halluzinationen, die den eigenen inneren Organen zugeschrieben wurden.{br}
Experiment H4545-2
Untergruppe: Von niedriger Geburt, weiblich
Die Versuchspersonen sind innerhalb von einer Stunde nach Betreten des Laboratoriums neben den Gemächern des Kinds gestorben. Die meisten hatten sich die Zunge gebissen oder den Kiefer schwer ausgerenkt. Manche Versuchspersonen besaßen nicht die nötige Kraft, um ihn vom Rest des Schädels zu trennen. Todesursache: Schwere Kopfverletzungen verursacht durch Schlagen des Kopfes gegen die Wände oder den Boden.{br}
Experiment H4545-3
Untergruppe: Ein gelähmter Patient, der durch den Schock nach einem Manufactorum-Unfall die Fähigkeit zu sprechen verloren hatte, männlich
Die Versuchsperson bemerkte in dem verkommenen Gewebe ein kribbelndes Gefühl. Während Regent Aaronto Orsellios Besuch bei dem Kind lächelte die Versuchsperson, begann zu summen (vermutlich in dem Versuch, eine Volksweise wiederzugeben) und versuchte dann, den Diener anzusprechen, der ihr das Essen brachte. Eine längere Unterhaltung war aufgrund der Tatsache, dass der Diener keine Zunge besitzt, nicht möglich.{br}
Experiment H4545-4
Untergruppe: Eine fehlerbehaftete Nachfahrin von Lord P. Orsellio. Neben einer allgemeinen Geistesschwäche weist sie eine Mutation des Gewebes auf, das für die Installation der Augmentationen erforderlich ist, durch die das Bewusstsein mit dem Schiff verbunden wird. Sie wurde daher für untauglich befunden, die hohe Kunst der Navigation zu studieren. Weiblich.
Die Versuchspersonen haben drei Tage lang das Handeln des Kindes gespiegelt. Am vierten Tag ist das Kind emotional geworden, als es vom vorzeitigen Ableben von Amos Cantarelli erfahren hat, einem Offizier ihrer Leibgarde. Eine der Versuchspersonen hat als Reaktion darauf mehrere Schichten Gewebe von ihrem eigenen Gesicht abgezogen und ist daraufhin an einem schweren Herzinfarkt verstorben.
Die letzte lebende Versuchsperson wurde hingerichtet, weil sie versucht hat, Kontakt mit dem Kind aufzunehmen.

languages.text:
Section expérimentale : influence de l'Enfant sur l'état psychoémotionnel de différents représentants de l'Imperium
Niveau d'accès : Orsellio-T-prime{br}
Expérience H4545-1
Sous-groupe : basse extraction, masculin
Les cobayes montrent les signes d'un stress aigu. La plupart ont trouvé la mort des suites d'une hémorragie moins de 24 heures après le placement en laboratoire, en raison de l'impossibilité d'interrompre la décharge de sécrétions oculaires (les larmes) et leur remplacement physiologique par le tissu connecteur de l'environnement interne du corps. Les sujets présentant la plus forte résistance à la résonance sacrée de l'Enfant se sont éteints quelques chrono-tours plus tard : lésions importantes à l'abdomen, sans doute infligées par une lame métallique dentelée ; les cobayes sont morts étranglés avec leurs propres intestins. Leurs derniers cris ont montré des inquiétudes relatives à d'abominables tentacules et des vers du néant, des hallucinations visant leurs propres organes internes.{br}
Expérience H4545-2
Sous-groupe : basse extraction, féminin
Les cobayes sont morts moins d'une heure après leur entrée dans le laboratoire adjacent aux appartements de l'Enfant. La plupart s'étaient sectionné la langue avec leurs propres dents ou s'étaient disloqué la mâchoire, bien que certains n'aient pas eu la force requise pour la détacher entièrement du reste du crâne. Cause de la mort : blessures graves à la tête, provoquées par des impacts avec les murs ou le sol.{br}
Expérience H4545-3
Sous-groupe : patient paralysé devenu aphasique suite à un accident dans un manufactorum, masculin
Le cobaye a remarqué un picotement dans les tissus détériorés. Au cours de la visite du régent Aaronto Orsellio à l'Enfant, le cobaye a souri et s'est mis à chantonner (sans doute un air populaire), puis a tenté de s'adresser au serviteur lui apportant à manger. La conversation s'est trouvée écourtée du fait de l'absence de langue du sujet.{br}
Expérience H4545-4
Sous-groupe : descendante déficiente du seigneur P. Orsellio, déclarée inapte à l'étude de l'art supérieur de la navigation suite à la mutation des tissus requis pour l'installation des augmentations obligatoires à la fusion de la conscience du sujet avec le réceptacle, en plus d'une faiblesse d'esprit générale, sujet de sexe féminin
Les cobayes ont copié les gestes de l'Enfant pendant trois jours. Le quatrième jour, l'Enfant s'est trouvée bouleversée par l'annonce du décès inopiné d'Amos Cantarelli, officier de sa garde personnelle. Conséquence directe de ce changement, l'une des cobayes s'est arraché plusieurs couches de son épiderme facial, ce qui a provoqué une crise cardiaque fatale.
Le dernier cobaye encore en vie a été exécuté pour avoir tenté d'entrer en contact avec l'Enfant.

languages.text:
实验类别：圣子对帝国不同人群心理状态的影响
访问级别：奥赛罗，T，一级{br}
实验：H4545-1
组别：下等人，男性
实验对象表现出急性应激症状。绝大多数实验对象无法停止眼部分泌物（眼泪），这导致身体用内部环境的结缔组织来替代这些分泌物。因此，绝大多数实验对象在进入实验箱后的第一天，就会因为失血过多而死亡。对圣子情感共振抵抗力最强的那部分人，会在几个计时周期之后死亡。那些人的腹部出现了大面积伤口，很可能是由锯齿状的金属片造成的。那些实验对象是被自己的肠子勒死的。他们临死前狂叫不止，充满了对邪恶触手与虚空蠕虫的恐惧，这些幻觉的源头是他们自己的内脏。{br}
实验：H4545-2
组别：下等人，女性
实验对象在进入圣子房间旁边的实验室之后，全部在一个小时内死亡。绝大多数人的舌头被咬断，或是下巴严重脱臼。其余实验对象由于缺乏足够的力量，无法将舌头与头骨的其他部分分离。实验对象的死因是撞击墙壁或地板，导致头部严重受损。{br}
实验：H4545-3
组别：一名瘫痪的病人，由于制造工厂发生事故，病人受到冲击而瘫痪，还因此失去了说话能力，男性
实验对象在已经退化的身体组织中感觉到了刺痛感。在摄政王阿伦托·奥赛罗探望圣子期间，受试者微笑着开始哼唱（很可能是在尝试演奏平民之间的乐曲），随后试图与给他送食物的仆人交谈。由于仆人没有舌头，因此这场对话没有持续太长时间。{br}
实验：H4545-4
组别：奥赛罗家族的贵族成员某位有缺陷的后代。此名后代由于身体组织发生变异，无法安装用来将人类意识与舰船意识进行融合的植入物，因此无法学习深奥的导航技术。此外，这位后代还表现出了心智孱弱的特点。女性
前三天里，实验对象一直都在模仿圣子的行为。到了第四天，圣子听说她的贴身卫队军官阿莫斯·坎塔雷利不幸离世的消息之后，变得非常沮丧。结果，其中一名实验对象脸上的几层组织遭到了剥离，随后死于严重的心脏病。
最后一名幸存的实验对象由于试图与圣子接触，遭到处决。
languages.original_text:
Experimental section: the Child's influence on the psycho-emotional state of various representatives of the Imperium
Access level: Orsellio-T-prime{br}
Experiment H4545-1
Subgroup: lowborn, male
Test subjects exhibit signs of acute stress. The majority perished of blood loss within a day of being placed in the laboratory chamber due to the inability to halt the discharge of ocular secretions (tears) and the body's subsequent replacement of these secretions with the connective tissue of its internal environment. The individuals with the greatest resistance to the sacred Child's resonance died several chrono-turns later: extensive wounds in the abdomen, presumably inflicted by a jagged piece of metal; death was caused by strangulation with the subjects' own intestines. The subjects' final shouts exhibited concerns over abominable tentacles and void worms, hallucinations prescribed to their own internal organs.{br}
Experiment H4545-2
Subgroup: lowborn, female
The test subjects died within an hour of entering the laboratory adjacent to the Child's chambers. Most had their tongues bitten off or their jaws badly dislocated: some test subjects lacked the physical strength to separate it from the rest of the skull. Cause of death: severe head injuries caused by impacting the walls or the floor.{br}
Experiment H4545-3
Subgroup: a paralysed patient who lost the ability to speak due to the shock caused by a manufactorum accident, male
The test subject noted a tingling sensation in the deteriorated tissue. During Regent Aaronto Orsellio's visit to the Child, the test subject smiled and started humming (most likely trying to carry some plebeian tune) and then attempted to address the servant who brought him food. A lengthy conversation was prohibitive due to the servant's lack of a tongue.{br}
Experiment H4545-4
Subgroup: a defective offspring of Lord P. Orsellio, pronounced unfit for studying the high art of Navigation owing to the mutation of tissues required for installation of the obligatory augmentations that merge one's consciousness with the vessel, additionally they display an overall feebleness of mind, female
The test subjects mirrored the Child's actions for three days. On the fourth day the Child became upset after hearing the news about the untimely demise of Amos Cantarelli, an officer of her personal guard. As a result, one of the test subjects peeled away several layers of tissue from her face and died from the resulting massive heart attack.
The last surviving test subject was executed for attempting to contact the Child.

traits.locale_text:
实验类别：圣子对帝国不同人群心理状态的影响
访问级别：奥塞罗，T，一级{br}
实验：№H4545-1
组别：下等人，男性
实验对象表现出急性应激症状。绝大多数实验对象无法停止眼部分泌物（眼泪），这导致身体用内部环境的结缔组织来替代这些分泌物。因此，绝大多数实验对象在进入实验箱后的第一天，就会因为失血过多而死亡。对圣子情感共振抵抗力最强的那部分人，会在几个计时轮回之后死亡。那些人的腹部出现了大面积伤口，很可能是由锯齿状的金属片造成的。那些实验对象是被自己的肠子勒死的。他们临死前狂喊不止，充满了对邪恶的触手与虚空蠕虫的恐惧，而这些幻觉源于他们自己的内脏。{br}
实验：№H4545-2
组别：下等人，女性
实验对象在进入圣子房间旁边的实验室之后，全部在一个小时内死亡。绝大多数人的舌头被咬断，或是下巴严重脱臼。其余实验对象由于缺乏足够的力量，无法将舌头与头骨的其他部分分离。实验对象的死因是撞击墙壁或地板，导致头部严重受损。{br}
实验：№H4545-3
组别：一名瘫痪的病人，由于制造工厂发生事故，病人受到冲击而瘫痪，还因此失去了说话能力，男性

实验：№H4545-4
组别：奥塞罗家族的贵族成员某位有缺陷的后代。此名后代由于身体组织发生变异，无法安装用来将人类意识与舰船意识进行融合的植入物，因此无法学习深奥的导航技术。此外，这位后代还表现出了心智孱弱的特点。女性
前三天里，实验对象一直都在模仿圣子的行为。到了第四天，圣子听说她的的贴身卫队军官阿莫斯·坎塔雷利不幸离世的消息之后，变得非常沮丧。结果，其中一名实验对象脸上的几层组织遭到了剥离，随后死于严重的心脏病。
最后一名幸存的实验对象由于试图与圣子接触，遭到处决。

languages.text:
実験セクション：帝国のあらゆる対象の感情錯乱状態に及ぼす御子の影響力
アクセスレベル：Orsellio-T-prime{br}
実験 H4545-1
サブグループ：ロウボーン、男
被験者達は急性ストレスの兆候を示している。実験室に来てから1日と経たずして、眼の分泌物（涙）の流出が止まらなくなり、その後この分泌物が体内の結合組織に置き換えられ、大多数が失血死した。神聖なる御子の共鳴に対して強い抵抗力を持った者達は、何度目かのクロノ回転後に死亡。腹部にノコギリ歯のような金属片と思われる物で付いたと考えられる傷が広範囲に認められた。死因は被験者自身の腸を使った窒息死である。被験者は最後に大きな声で、気味の悪い触手とヴォイドワームがいて不安だと叫んでいたが、自らの臓器による幻覚であった。{br}
実験 H4545-2
サブグループ：ロウボーン、女
被験者達は、御子の部屋に隣接する実験室に入って1時間以内に死亡。ほとんどの被験者は舌を噛み千切っているか、顎を激しく外していて、一部の被験者は顎を頭蓋骨の残りの部分から離す力がなかったようである。死因：壁や床への衝撃による頭部の外傷。{br}
実験 H4545-3
サブグループ：聖工場の事故のショックで話せなくなった麻痺患者、男
被験者は、衰えた組織にヒリヒリとした痛みを感じる。摂政アーロント・オーセリオが御子を訪ねている間、被験者は笑って鼻歌を歌い始め（おそらく何か大衆音楽を歌おうとしていた）、食事を運んできた従者に話しかけようとした。従者には舌がないので、長い会話は妨害された。{br}
実験H4545-4
サブグループ：ロード・P. オーセリオの問題のある子孫。意識を船と通わせる際に必須の増強装置の設置になくてはならない組織の変異により、上級の航宙術の勉強には不適格だと判断された。また、全般的に精神の脆弱性を呈す、女
被験者達は3日間、御子の行動を模倣した。4日目、御子付きの護衛だったアモス・カンタレリの早すぎる死の知らせを聞いて、御子が取り乱す。その結果、被験者のひとりが顔の組織を何層も剥がし、そのせいで起こった激しい心臓発作が原因で死亡した。
最後に生き残った被験者は、御子との接触を試みて処刑された。

languages.text:
Deneysel bölüm: Çocuk'un İmparatorluk'un çeşitli temsilcilerinin psikoduygusal durumu üzerindeki etkisi
Erişim seviyesi: Orsellio-T-prime{br}
Deney H4545-1
Alt grup: Alt tabakalı, erkek
Denekler, akut stres belirtileri gösteriyor. Çoğu, oküler sekresyon (gözyaşı) salınımının durdurulamaması ve vücudun daha sonra bu sekresyonların yerine iç ortamdaki bağ dokusunu koymaya çalışması nedeniyle laboratuvar odasına yerleştirildikten sonraki bir gün içinde kan kaybından öldü. Kutsal Çocuk'un rezonansına karşı en büyük dirence sahip bireyler, birkaç kronodevirden sonra öldü. Karınlarında, muhtemelen pürüzlü bir metal parçasıyla açılmış geniş yaralar var. Ölüm, deneklerin kendi bağırsaklarıyla boğulmasından kaynaklı. Deneklerin son bağırışları, iğrenç dokunaçlar ve uçsuz solucanları hakkındaki endişelerini dile getirmek şeklinde oldu. Bunun sebebi de halüsinasyonların tetiklemesi sonucu kendi iç organlarını bu şekilde tanımlamaları.{br}
Deney H4545-2
Alt grup: Alt tabaka, kadın
Denekler, Çocuk'un odasının bitişiğindeki laboratuvara girdikten sonraki bir saat içinde öldü. Birçoğunun dilleri ısırılmış veya çeneleri kötü bir şekilde yerinden çıkmış ki bazı denekler, çenelerini kafataslarından ayıracak fiziksel güçten de yoksundu. Ölüm nedeni: Duvarlara veya zemine çarpmaktan kaynaklı ciddi kafa travmaları.{br}
Deney H4545-3
Alt grup: Bir manifaktorum kazasının neden olduğu şok nedeniyle konuşma yeteneğini kaybeden felçli bir hasta, erkek
Denek, felçli dokuda bir karıncalanma hissetti. Naip Aaronto Orsellio'nun Çocuk'u ziyareti sırasında gülümsedi ve mırıldanmaya (büyük olasılıkla avama özgü bir ezgiyi) başladı. Sonra da kendisine yiyecek getiren bir hizmetkâra hitap etmeye çalıştı. Hizmetkârın dili noksan olduğu için uzun bir muhabbet mümkün değildi.{br}
Deney H4545-4
Alt grup: Lord P. Orsellio'nun, kişinin bilincini gemiyle birleştiren zorunlu ogmentasyonların yerleştirilmesi için gerekli dokuların mutasyona uğramasından ötürü yüce Rotacılık sanatı eğitimi almaya uygun olmadığı bildirilen ve ayrıca genel bir zihin zayıflığı sergileyen evlatları, kadın
Denekler, üç gün boyunca Çocuk'un eylemlerini kopyaladı. Çocuk, dördüncü gün kişisel korumalarından Amos Cantarelli'nin zamansız ölümünü duyduktan sonra üzüldü. Bunun sonucunda da deneklerden biri, yüzündeki birkaç doku katmanını soydu ve neticesinde ağır kalp krizinden öldü.
Hayatta kalan son denek, Çocuk'la iletişime geçmeye çalıştığı için infaz edildi.

Çoğu, oküler sekresyon (gözyaşı) salınımının durdurulamaması ve vücudun daha sonra bu sekresyonların yerine iç ortamdaki bağ dokusunu koymaya çalışması nedeniyle laboratuvar odasına yerleştirildikten sonraki bir gün içinde kan kaybından öldü. Kutsal Çocuk'un rezonansına karşı en büyük dirence sahip bireyler, birkaç kronodevirden sonra öldü. Karınlarında, muhtemelen pürüzlü bir metal parçasıyla açılmış geniş yaralar var. Ölüm, deneklerin kendi bağırsaklarıyla boğulmasından kaynaklı. Deneklerin son bağırışları, iğrenç dokunaçlar ve uçsuz solucanları hakkındaki endişelerini dile getirmek şeklinde oldu. Bunun sebebi de halüsinasyonların tetiklemesi sonucu kendi iç organlarını bu şekilde tanımlamaları.{br}
Deney H4545-2
Alt grup: Alt tabaka, kadın
Denekler, Çocuk'un odasının bitişiğindeki laboratuvara girdikten sonraki bir saat içinde öldü. Birçoğunun dilleri ısırılmış veya çeneleri kötü bir şekilde yerinden çıkmış ki bazı denekler, çenelerini kafataslarından ayıracak fiziksel güçten de yoksundu. Ölüm nedeni: Duvarlara veya zemine çarpmaktan kaynaklı ciddi kafa travmaları.{br}
Deney H4545-3
Alt grup: Bir manufaktorum kazasının neden olduğu şok nedeniyle konuşma yeteneğini kaybeden felçli bir hasta, erkek
Denek, felçli dokuda bir karıncalanma hissetti. Naip Aaronto Orsellio'nun Çocuk'u ziyareti sırasında gülümsedi ve mırıldanmaya (büyük olasılıkla avama özgü bir ezgiyi) başladı. Sonra da kendisine yiyecek getiren bir hizmetkâra hitap etmeye çalıştı. Hizmetkârın dili noksan olduğu için uzun bir muhabbet mümkün değildi.{br}
Deney H4545-4
Alt grup: Lord P. Orsellio'nun, kişinin bilincini gemiyle birleştiren zorunlu ogmentasyonların yerleştirilmesi için gerekli dokuların mutasyona uğramasından ötürü yüce Rotacılık sanatı eğitimi almaya uygun olmadığı bildirilen ve ayrıca genel bir zihin zayıflığı sergileyen evlatları, kadın
Denekler, üç gün boyunca Çocuk'un eylemlerini kopyaladı. Çocuk, dördüncü gün kişisel korumalarından Amos Cantarelli'nin zamansız ölümünü duyduktan sonra üzüldü. Bunun sonucunda da deneklerden biri, yüzündeki birkaç doku katmanını soydu ve neticesinde ağır kalp krizinden öldü.
Hayatta kalan son denek, Çocuk'la iletişime geçmeye çalıştığı için infaz edildi.
